==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Gouzien is a member of the [[Beret Society]]. He gets captured by the Traveler and Wriothesley. Wriothesley then forces Wyler and Gouzien to give out the real location of the Beret Society's headquarters.

==Trivia==
*{{w|Henri Gouzien}} was French sculptor. Most of his recorded work involves sculptural work for war memorials in the {{w|Morbihan}} area.
